controls.name: rounding
controls.caption: Rounding
controls.description:
This flag is used for integer matrix elements.
If set, the real average value Î± is converted into integer result as (w0 + w1 + w2 + w3 + w4 + w5 + w6 + w7 + w8 + 4) / 9 instead of simple (w0 + w1 + w2 + w3 + w4 + w5 + w6 + w7 + w8) / 9. For non-negative values (usual situation), it means rounding to the nearest integer.
